import React, { useState } from 'react'; const AddDoctorModal = ({ isOpen, closeModal }) => { const [doctorDetails, setDoctorDetails] = useState({ clinicAddress: '', phone: '', city: '', name: '', designation: '', hospital: '', email: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setDoctorDetails((prevDetails) => ({ ...prevDetails, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Add logic to save the doctor details // You can call an API to save the details here console.log('Doctor details:', doctorDetails); closeModal(); // Close the modal after submitting }; return (

Add Doctor

); }; export default AddDoctorModal;
